text: ISC Paris Business School is a European higher studies establishment. The school is in Paris, France. It has been established in 1962. ISC Paris is specialist in the fields of economics, social sciences and management.Avec l'AACSB, une première accréditation pour l'ISC Paris The school has a partnership with ISIPCA for an MBA fragrances and cosmetics.Les Parfums Et Les Cosmétiques MBA ==References== == Further reading == * ISC Paris website Category:Education in France
title: ISC Paris Business School
